p: As for the cell number, even if no dose-finding studies are available for CD133 + cells in RA, we have delivered into the myocardium a mean of 6.5 × 10 6 CD133 + cells, a cell dosage 2-fold higher than the REGENT-VSEL study, which is the only one of the RCT in RA delivering selected CD133 + cells obtained from the BM.
